Caption.PlainTextCaption: Come on then, come on. Get cracking
Caption.HtmlStyledCaption: <html><body><font face="SansSerif"><font size="2"><font color="#FFFFFF"><font bgcolor="#000000">Come on then, come on. Get cracking</font></font></font></font></body></html>

Caption.PlainTextCaption: It's not enough to end one war
Caption.HtmlStyledCaption: <html><body><font face="SansSerif"><font color="#FFFFFF">It's not enough to end one war</font></font></body></html>

Caption.PlainTextCaption: We've got to end them all
Caption.HtmlStyledCaption: <html><body><font face="SansSerif"><font size="2"><font color="#FFFFFF"><font bgcolor="#000000">We've got to end them all</font></font></font></font></body></html>

Caption.PlainTextCaption: You think we've finished with the aggressor?
Caption.HtmlStyledCaption: <html><body><font face="SansSerif"><font color="#FFFFFF">You think we've finished with the aggressor?</font></font></body></html>

Caption.PlainTextCaption: We haven't.
Caption.HtmlStyledCaption: <html><body><font face="SansSerif"><font color="#FFFFFF">We haven't.</font></font></body></html>

Caption.PlainTextCaption: He's trampling the dim streets under his jack boots yet.
Caption.HtmlStyledCaption: <html><body><font face="SansSerif"><font color="#FFFFFF">He's trampling the dim streets under his jack boots yet.</font></font></body></html>

Caption.PlainTextCaption: They're waiting for us down there in those occupied territories.
Caption.HtmlStyledCaption: <html><body><font face="SansSerif"><font size="2"><font color="#FFFFFF"><font bgcolor="#000000">They're waiting for us down there in those occupied territories.</font></font></font></font></body></html>

Caption.PlainTextCaption: They're waiting for D-day and the armies of liberation.
Caption.HtmlStyledCaption: <html><body><font face="SansSerif"><font color="#FFFFFF">They're waiting for D-day and the armies of liberation.</font></font></body></html>

Caption.PlainTextCaption: Come on then you Leaders
Caption.HtmlStyledCaption: <html><body><font face="SansSerif"><font size="2"><font color="#FFFFFF"><font bgcolor="#000000">Come on then you Leaders</font></font></font></font></body></html>

Caption.PlainTextCaption: Come on, where are you?
Caption.HtmlStyledCaption: <html><body><font face="SansSerif"><font size="2"><font color="#FFFFFF"><font bgcolor="#000000">Come on, where are you?</font></font></font></font></body></html>

Caption.PlainTextCaption: Architects
Caption.HtmlStyledCaption: <html><body><font face="SansSerif"><font size="2"><font color="#FFFFFF"><font bgcolor="#000000">Architects</font></font></font></font></body></html>

Caption.PlainTextCaption: Doctors
Caption.HtmlStyledCaption: <html><body><font face="SansSerif"><font color="#FFFFFF">Doctors</font></font></body></html>

Caption.PlainTextCaption: Planners
Caption.HtmlStyledCaption: <html><body><font face="SansSerif"><font color="#FFFFFF">Planners</font></font></body></html>

Caption.PlainTextCaption: Engineers, social workers step out into the light.
Caption.HtmlStyledCaption: <html><body><font face="SansSerif"><font color="#FFFFFF">Engineers, social workers step out into the light.</font></font></body></html>

Caption.PlainTextCaption: It's you who have to plan this invasion.
Caption.HtmlStyledCaption: <html><body><font face="SansSerif"><font color="#FFFFFF">It's you who have to plan this invasion.</font></font></body></html>

Caption.PlainTextCaption: We are waiting for the signal now.
Caption.HtmlStyledCaption: <html><body><font face="SansSerif"><font color="#FFFFFF">We are waiting for the signal now.</font></font></body></html>

Caption.PlainTextCaption: A thousand years we've been waiting
Caption.HtmlStyledCaption: <html><body><font face="SansSerif"><font color="#FFFFFF">A thousand years we've been waiting</font></font></body></html>

Caption.PlainTextCaption: Come on then
Caption.HtmlStyledCaption: <html><body><font face="SansSerif"><font size="2"><font color="#FFFFFF"><font bgcolor="#000000">Come on then</font></font></font></font></body></html>

Caption.PlainTextCaption: Come on, let's hear it.
Caption.HtmlStyledCaption: <html><body><font face="SansSerif"><font size="2"><font color="#FFFFFF"><font bgcolor="#000000">Come on, let's hear it.</font></font></font></font></body></html>

Caption.PlainTextCaption: So you're still afraid some of you, hey?
Caption.HtmlStyledCaption: <html><body><font face="SansSerif"><font color="#FFFFFF">So you're still afraid some of you, hey?</font></font></body></html>

Caption.PlainTextCaption: It's hopeless; it'll never be done.
Caption.HtmlStyledCaption: <html><body><font face="SansSerif"><font color="#FFFFFF">It's hopeless; it'll never be done.</font></font></body></html>

Caption.PlainTextCaption: You can't change human nature, and so on and so on and so on.
Caption.HtmlStyledCaption: <html><body><font face="SansSerif"><font color="#FFFFFF">You can't change human nature, and so on and so on and so on.</font></font></body></html>

Caption.PlainTextCaption: Well you think again.
Caption.HtmlStyledCaption: <html><body><font face="SansSerif"><font color="#FFFFFF">Well you think again.</font></font></body></html>

Caption.PlainTextCaption: If somebody came along to you and said:
Caption.HtmlStyledCaption: <html><body><font face="SansSerif"><font color="#FFFFFF">If somebody came along to you and said:</font></font></body></html>

Caption.PlainTextCaption: Listen you British, Give it up.
Caption.HtmlStyledCaption: <html><body><font face="SansSerif"><font size="2"><font color="#FFFFFF"><font bgcolor="#000000">Listen you British, Give it up.</font></font></font></font></body></html>

Caption.PlainTextCaption: Chuck it you feeble democracy and admit you're beaten.
Caption.HtmlStyledCaption: <html><body><font face="SansSerif"><font size="2"><font color="#FFFFFF"><font bgcolor="#000000">Chuck it you feeble democracy and admit you're beaten.</font></font></font></font></body></html>

Caption.PlainTextCaption: Well what would you say to that?
Caption.HtmlStyledCaption: <html><body><font face="SansSerif"><font color="#FFFFFF">Well what would you say to that?</font></font></body></html>

Caption.PlainTextCaption: How would you take that?
Caption.HtmlStyledCaption: <html><body><font face="SansSerif"><font color="#FFFFFF">How would you take that?</font></font></body></html>

Caption.PlainTextCaption: Lying down?
Caption.HtmlStyledCaption: <html><body><font face="SansSerif"><font color="#FFFFFF">Lying down?</font></font></body></html>

Caption.PlainTextCaption: Not much!
Caption.HtmlStyledCaption: <html><body><font face="SansSerif"><font color="#FFFFFF">Not much!</font></font></body></html>

Caption.PlainTextCaption: Well then, what are you afraid of now?
Caption.HtmlStyledCaption: <html><body><font face="SansSerif"><font color="#FFFFFF">Well then, what are you afraid of now?</font></font></body></html>

Caption.PlainTextCaption: The only real wealth of a country is the health and happiness and freedom of its people.
Caption.HtmlStyledCaption: <html><body><font face="SansSerif"><font color="#FFFFFF">The only real wealth of a country is the health and happiness and freedom of its people.</font></font></body></html>

Caption.PlainTextCaption: Who dares to estimate the money value of children killed by poor food and bad housing?
Caption.HtmlStyledCaption: <html><body><font face="SansSerif"><font color="#FFFFFF">Who dares to estimate the money value of children killed by poor food and bad housing?</font></font></body></html>

Caption.PlainTextCaption: Who dares to put a price on the million people killed by bad housing between the two Wars?
Caption.HtmlStyledCaption: <html><body><font face="SansSerif"><font color="#FFFFFF">Who dares to put a price on the million people killed by bad housing between the two Wars?</font></font></body></html>

Caption.PlainTextCaption: The old fashioned way of reckoning human wellbeing in terms of profits.
Caption.HtmlStyledCaption: <html><body><font face="SansSerif"><font color="#FFFFFF">The old fashioned way of reckoning human wellbeing in terms of profits.</font></font></body></html>

Caption.PlainTextCaption: I tell you that way of thinking has got to be eliminated
Caption.HtmlStyledCaption: <html><body><font face="SansSerif"><font size="2"><font color="#FFFFFF"><font bgcolor="#000000">I tell you that way of thinking has got to be eliminated</font></font></font></font></body></html>

Caption.PlainTextCaption: Liquidated
Caption.HtmlStyledCaption: <html><body><font face="SansSerif"><font size="2"><font color="#FFFFFF"><font bgcolor="#000000">Liquidated</font></font></font></font></body></html>

Caption.PlainTextCaption: Mopped up
Caption.HtmlStyledCaption: <html><body><font face="SansSerif"><font size="2"><font color="#FFFFFF"><font bgcolor="#000000">Mopped up</font></font></font></font></body></html>

Caption.PlainTextCaption: Wiped out!
Caption.HtmlStyledCaption: <html><body><font face="SansSerif"><font size="2"><font color="#FFFFFF"><font bgcolor="#000000">Wiped out!</font></font></font></font></body></html>

Caption.PlainTextCaption: Look round you.
Caption.HtmlStyledCaption: <html><body><font face="SansSerif"><font color="#FFFFFF">Look round you.</font></font></body></html>

Caption.PlainTextCaption: There they are
Caption.HtmlStyledCaption: <html><body><font face="SansSerif"><font color="#FFFFFF">There they are</font></font></body></html>

Caption.PlainTextCaption: the men and woman who beat fascism
Caption.HtmlStyledCaption: <html><body><font face="SansSerif"><font color="#FFFFFF">the men and woman who beat fascism</font></font></body></html>

Caption.PlainTextCaption: the men and woman in the fighting services
Caption.HtmlStyledCaption: <html><body><font face="SansSerif"><font color="#FFFFFF">the men and woman in the fighting services</font></font></body></html>

Caption.PlainTextCaption: the merchant seamen
Caption.HtmlStyledCaption: <html><body><font face="SansSerif"><font color="#FFFFFF">the merchant seamen</font></font></body></html>

Caption.PlainTextCaption: the workers in the factories and laboratories
Caption.HtmlStyledCaption: <html><body><font face="SansSerif"><font color="#FFFFFF">the workers in the factories and laboratories</font></font></body></html>

Caption.PlainTextCaption: the mines and the fields.
Caption.HtmlStyledCaption: <html><body><font face="SansSerif"><font color="#FFFFFF">the mines and the fields.</font></font></body></html>

Caption.PlainTextCaption: You know who you are?
Caption.HtmlStyledCaption: <html><body><font face="SansSerif"><font color="#FFFFFF">You know who you are?</font></font></body></html>

Caption.PlainTextCaption: You, yourselves, millions of us
Caption.HtmlStyledCaption: <html><body><font face="SansSerif"><font size="2"><font color="#FFFFFF"><font bgcolor="#000000">You, yourselves, millions of us</font></font></font></font></body></html>

Caption.PlainTextCaption: there's our army there where it always was
Caption.HtmlStyledCaption: <html><body><font face="SansSerif"><font color="#FFFFFF">there's our army there where it always was</font></font></body></html>

Caption.PlainTextCaption: standing upright in the shoes of the common people and who's the enemy?
Caption.HtmlStyledCaption: <html><body><font face="SansSerif"><font color="#FFFFFF">standing upright in the shoes of the common people and who's the enemy?</font></font></body></html>

Caption.PlainTextCaption: The dictator who rules by force and not by reason
Caption.HtmlStyledCaption: <html><body><font face="SansSerif"><font color="#FFFFFF">The dictator who rules by force and not by reason</font></font></body></html>

Caption.PlainTextCaption: him and his collaborators.
Caption.HtmlStyledCaption: <html><body><font face="SansSerif"><font color="#FFFFFF">him and his collaborators.</font></font></body></html>

Caption.PlainTextCaption: Now then, I'll give you your answer to problem number three,
Caption.HtmlStyledCaption: <html><body><font face="SansSerif"><font color="#FFFFFF">Now then, I'll give you your answer to problem number three,</font></font></body></html>

Caption.PlainTextCaption: It's in your hands right now.
Caption.HtmlStyledCaption: <html><body><font face="SansSerif"><font color="#FFFFFF">It's in your hands right now.</font></font></body></html>

Caption.PlainTextCaption: Yours by the constitution of this country
Caption.HtmlStyledCaption: <html><body><font face="SansSerif"><font size="2"><font color="#FFFFFF"><font bgcolor="#000000">Yours by the constitution of this country</font></font></font></font></body></html>

Caption.PlainTextCaption: All the ministries of this and that
Caption.HtmlStyledCaption: <html><body><font face="SansSerif"><font size="2"><font color="#FFFFFF"><font bgcolor="#000000">All the ministries of this and that</font></font></font></font></body></html>

Caption.PlainTextCaption: They are the servants of parliament.
Caption.HtmlStyledCaption: <html><body><font face="SansSerif"><font color="#FFFFFF">They are the servants of parliament.</font></font></body></html>

Caption.PlainTextCaption: All the MPs from the towns, cities and countryside
Caption.HtmlStyledCaption: <html><body><font face="SansSerif"><font color="#FFFFFF">All the MPs from the towns, cities and countryside</font></font></body></html>

Caption.PlainTextCaption: They are put there by us to represent us
Caption.HtmlStyledCaption: <html><body><font face="SansSerif"><font color="#FFFFFF">They are put there by us to represent us</font></font></body></html>

Caption.PlainTextCaption: Tell them, you have the right, that's real democracy
Caption.HtmlStyledCaption: <html><body><font face="SansSerif"><font size="2"><font color="#FFFFFF"><font bgcolor="#000000">Tell them, you have the right, that's real democracy</font></font></font></font></body></html>

Caption.PlainTextCaption: That's what we've been fighting for.
Caption.HtmlStyledCaption: <html><body><font face="SansSerif"><font color="#FFFFFF">That's what we've been fighting for.</font></font></body></html>

Caption.PlainTextCaption: Are you going to use your right?
Caption.HtmlStyledCaption: <html><body><font face="SansSerif"><font color="#FFFFFF">Are you going to use your right?</font></font></body></html>

Caption.PlainTextCaption: Or will you shut your eyes and let yourselves and us be lead into one crisis after another.
Caption.HtmlStyledCaption: <html><body><font face="SansSerif"><font color="#FFFFFF">Or will you shut your eyes and let yourselves and us be lead into one crisis after another.</font></font></body></html>

Caption.PlainTextCaption: Into worse depression, worse poverty, worse slumps, worse sickness.
Caption.HtmlStyledCaption: <html><body><font face="SansSerif"><font color="#FFFFFF">Into worse depression, worse poverty, worse slumps, worse sickness.</font></font></body></html>

Caption.PlainTextCaption: Come on make up your minds.
Caption.HtmlStyledCaption: <html><body><font face="SansSerif"><font color="#FFFFFF">Come on make up your minds.</font></font></body></html>

Caption.PlainTextCaption: If you lose this chance it may never come again.
Caption.HtmlStyledCaption: <html><body><font face="SansSerif"><font color="#FFFFFF">If you lose this chance it may never come again.</font></font></body></html>

Caption.PlainTextCaption: There are millions of us, you and me
Caption.HtmlStyledCaption: <html><body><font face="SansSerif"><font color="#FFFFFF">There are millions of us, you and me</font></font></body></html>

Caption.PlainTextCaption: We are the British people.
Caption.HtmlStyledCaption: <html><body><font face="SansSerif"><font color="#FFFFFF">We are the British people.</font></font></body></html>

Caption.PlainTextCaption: No power on earth can stop us once we've the will to win.
Caption.HtmlStyledCaption: <html><body><font face="SansSerif"><font color="#FFFFFF">No power on earth can stop us once we've the will to win.</font></font></body></html>
<html></html>
